name: freemegb
description: A GameBoy simulator written for Node.js with an Electron front-end. This program is designed to simulate the real hardware that was equipped in the system itself.

scripts.build-linux-deb: electron-packager . --platform=linux --out dist/ && electron-installer-debian --src dist/freemegb-linux-x64/ --dest dist/installers --arch amd64 --config config.json
scripts.build-all: npm run build-win & npm run build-darwin & npm run build-linux-deb
scripts.clean: rm -r dist; rm -r obj; rm -r bin

author: ioncloud64
